data.comment: Sergei Ivanov starts the match. Spartak Moscow with the kick-off in Moscow.
Throw-in for Dinamo Moscow at Otkritie Arena.
In the minute 1, Throw-in for Dinamo Moscow in the half of Spartak Moscow.
Can Dinamo Moscow get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Spartak Moscow's half?
Free kick for Spartak Moscow in their own half.
In the minute 3, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Sergei Ivanov signals a free kick to Dinamo Moscow.
Roman Neustadter (Dinamo Moscow) strikes at Otkritie Arena but his header is cleared.
In the minute 5, Ball safe as Dinamo Moscow is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Sergei Ivanov signals a Dinamo Moscow throw-in in Spartak Moscow's half.
Sergei Ivanov signals a free kick to Dinamo Moscow in their own half.
In the minute 6, Spartak Moscow are coming forward and Ezequiel Ponce gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Sergei Ivanov awards Dinamo Moscow a goal kick.
Dinamo Moscow have been awarded a corner by Sergei Ivanov.
In the minute 8, Daniil Fomin of Dinamo Moscow gets in a strike, but is off target.
Spartak Moscow have a goal kick.
Corner awarded to Spartak Moscow.
In the minute 10, Dinamo Moscow awarded a free kick in their own half.
Corner awarded to Dinamo Moscow.
Daniil Lesovoy (Dinamo Moscow) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 13, Ezequiel Ponce of Spartak Moscow is pulled up for offside.
Spartak Moscow awarded a free kick in their own half.
Dinamo Moscow have been awarded a corner by Sergei Ivanov.
In the minute 16, Dinamo Moscow to take a throw-in in Spartak Moscow territory.
Throw-in for Dinamo Moscow in the half of Spartak Moscow.
Free kick for Dinamo Moscow in the half of Spartak Moscow.
In the minute 17, Sergei Ivanov awards the home team a throw-in.
Can Spartak Moscow get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Dinamo Moscow's half?
Dinamo Moscow's Daniil Fomin gets in a shot on goal at Otkritie Arena. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 19, Corner awarded to Dinamo Moscow.
Dinamo Moscow have been awarded a corner by Sergei Ivanov.
Important block from the Dinamo Moscow defence as Roman Zobnin fires in a strike for Spartak Moscow.
In the minute 22, Corner awarded to Spartak Moscow.
Spartak Moscow have been awarded a corner by Sergei Ivanov.
Sergei Ivanov signals a free kick to Dinamo Moscow in their own half.
In the minute 23, Free kick for Dinamo Moscow in their own half.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Moscow.
Throw-in Dinamo Moscow.
In the minute 26, Spartak Moscow drive upfield and Ezequiel Ponce gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Dinamo Moscow defender.
Sergei Ivanov signals a free kick to Dinamo Moscow in their own half.
Throw-in for Dinamo Moscow close to the penalty box.
In the minute 27, Free kick Dinamo Moscow.
Dinamo Moscow to take a throw-in in Spartak Moscow territory.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 28, Spartak Moscow awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In Moscow a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In Moscow a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 33, Sergei Ivanov signals a Dinamo Moscow throw-in in Spartak Moscow's half.
Corner awarded to Dinamo Moscow.
Throw-in for Spartak Moscow in their own half.
In the minute 36, Throw-in for Spartak Moscow at Otkritie Arena.
Can Spartak Moscow get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Dinamo Moscow's half?
Sergei Ivanov awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 37, Ball safe as Spartak Moscow is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Spartak Moscow awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Sergei Ivanov signals a Dinamo Moscow throw-in in Spartak Moscow's half.
In the minute 41, Dinamo Moscow have been awarded a corner by Sergei Ivanov.
Clinton N'Jie gets his shot on target but fails to score for Dinamo Moscow.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 44, Roman Zobnin hits the post! Very nearly a goal there for Spartak Moscow!
1 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
Dinamo Moscow apply pressure at Otkritie Arena and a brilliant scoring opportunity is created for Nikola Moro but the strike hits the bar!
In the minute 45, Dinamo Moscow drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
The first-half has come to a close in Moscow.
Dinamo Moscow kick-off the second-half u- the match is underway again!
In the minute 47, Dinamo Moscow awarded a free kick in their own half.
Spartak Moscow are pushing forward but Alex Kral's finish is wide of the goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Dinamo Moscow goal kick.
In the minute 50, Throw-in for Spartak Moscow in their own half.
Throw-in for Spartak Moscow in the half of Dinamo Moscow.
Throw-in Spartak Moscow.
In the minute 52, In Moscow Spartak Moscow drive forward through Ayrton Lucas. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Spartak Moscow's Roman Zobnin gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Goal kick for Dinamo Moscow at Otkritie Arena.
In the minute 54, Spartak Moscow to take a throw-in in Dinamo Moscow territory.
Free kick for Spartak Moscow in their own half.
Sergei Ivanov signals a free kick to Dinamo Moscow in their own half.
In the minute 58, Sergei Ivanov signals a throw-in for Dinamo Moscow, close to Spartak Moscow's area.
Dinamo Moscow push forward at Otkritie Arena and Dmitri Skopintsev gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Spartak Moscow defence.
Spartak Moscow awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 58, The away team have replaced Clinton N'Jie with Vyacheslav Grulev. This is the first substitution made today by Sandro Schwarz.
Sergei Ivanov signals a Dinamo Moscow throw-in in Spartak Moscow's half.
Free kick Dinamo Moscow.
In the minute 60, Sergei Ivanov signals a free kick to Dinamo Moscow.
Spartak Moscow awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ball safe as Dinamo Moscow is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 63, Sergei Ivanov awards the home team a throw-in.
Dinamo Moscow to take a throw-in in Spartak Moscow territory.
Dmitri Skopintsev for Dinamo Moscow drives towards goal at Otkritie Arena. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 64, Spartak Moscow needs to be cautious. Dinamo Moscow have an attacking throw-in.
Spartak Moscow's Roman Zobnin gets in a shot on goal at Otkritie Arena. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Free kick for Spartak Moscow in the half of Dinamo Moscow.
In the minute 67, Throw-in for Dinamo Moscow in their own half.
Throw-in for Dinamo Moscow at Otkritie Arena.
Nikolay Komlichenko for Dinamo Moscow gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 68, Ball goes out of play for a Spartak Moscow goal kick.
In Moscow Spartak Moscow's Victor Moses is caught offside.
In Moscow a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 71, Dinamo Moscow's Vyacheslav Grulev breaks free at Otkritie Arena. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Goal kick for Spartak Moscow at Otkritie Arena.
In the minute 72, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Konstantin Tyukavin is replacing Nikolay Komlichenko for Dinamo Moscow at Otkritie Arena.
Free kick for Spartak Moscow in their own half.
Throw-in Dinamo Moscow.
In the minute 74, Aleksandr Kokorin for Spartak Moscow is whistled offside.
Domenico Tedesco (Spartak Moscow) is making a first substitution, with Zelimkhan Bakaev replacing Aleksandr Kokorin.
In the minute 76, Free kick for Spartak Moscow in their own half.
At Otkritie Arena, Vyacheslav Grulev has been yellow-carded for the away team.
Dinamo Moscow pushes forward through Dmitri Skopintsev, whose finish on goal is saved.
Corner awarded to Dinamo Moscow.
Sergei Ivanov signals a free kick to Spartak Moscow.
In the minute 78, Ivan Ordets is booked for the away team.
Dmitri Skopintsev puts the ball in the net and the away team now lead 0-1.
In the minute 79, Great play from Guillermo Varela to set up the goal.
Throw-in for Spartak Moscow in the half of Dinamo Moscow.
Dinamo Moscow have a goal kick.
In the minute 81, Dinamo Moscow awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ayrton Lucas is booked for the home team and will be suspended from the next match.
Can Spartak Moscow get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Dinamo Moscow's half?
In the minute 83, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Free kick for Spartak Moscow in the half of Dinamo Moscow.
Pavel Maslov (Spartak Moscow) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 85, Roman Zobnin levels the score at 1-1.
Nikola Moro gets his shot on target but fails to score for Dinamo Moscow.
Throw-in high up the field for Dinamo Moscow in Moscow.
In the minute 87, Sandro Schwarz is making the team's third substitution at Otkritie Arena with Charles Kabore replacing Nikola Moro.
Sergei Ivanov signals a free kick to Dinamo Moscow in their own half.
Dinamo Moscow have been awarded a corner by Sergei Ivanov.
2 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Dinamo Moscow's Daniil Lesovoy is whistled for offside at Otkritie Arena.
Daniil Fomin for Dinamo Moscow drives towards goal at Otkritie Arena. But the finish is unsuccessful.
It's 1-1 as the referee blows for full-time.
